General.Name: Cosmax
General.Description: Cosmax BTI, Inc. engages in the development, production, and supply of beauty products, health functional foods, pharmaceuticals, and special containers and equipment for customers in South Korea. The company offers sun and foundation creams; makeup creams and bases; hair and cleansing products; mascara and nail products; various color formulations and skin tones; lip sticks and shadows; lip essence and liquid products; body and mask sheets; powder pact products and makeup pencils; and fragrance products. It exports its products to approximately 30 countries. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
